title: Textile, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: twill weave with supplementary weft
description: On obverse, a design in white twill on a silver ground with extra silver warp forming some details of the design in varying weaves. Design shows tree branches with pointed, ovoid leaves and perching birds. Branches extend toward the center from each corner. Fabric is reversible.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 20th century.Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: twill weave with supplementary weft. 1938-16-1.
